actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To extend the retroactive period during which farm insolvency transactions are exempt from the prior law alternative minimum tax.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 to exempt farm insolvency transactions made after December 31, 1978, from alternative minimum tax (under prior law), thus effecting a three-year extension of the retroactive period that already exists.

titles.title: To extend the retroactive period during which farm insolvency transactions are exempt from the prior law alternative minimum tax.
